title: Fasting Sugar Vs HbA1c Confusion: Expert explains why test results differ
description: Diabetes diagnosis can be tricky. A fasting blood sugar test might seem normal, but your HbA1c could be high. This happens because HbA1c reflects average sugar over months, catching hidden spikes. Lifestyle changes like diet and exercise can help lower these levels. Understanding these tests is key for better health management.
